Description: The hero of the picture painfully afraid of losing the love and understanding of loved ones: the mother, the woman he loved his son. And feels that life every day takes them further apart. Trying to keep the family together, he turns to the memory of the most powerful experiences of his childhood, trying in that child, perception of the world to find the support and justify their current experiences.
